mapper.select: SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state, num FROM (SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state, rownum as num FROM (SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state FROM OFFICIAL order by cid desc)) WHERE (num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}) and state = 1
SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key FROM OFFICIAL WHERE cid = #{id}

SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state, num FROM (SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state, rownum as num FROM (SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state from OFFICIAL where (cid like '%' || #{id} || '%' or email like '%' || #{id} || '%' or cname like '%' || #{id} || '%' or name like '%' || #{id} || '%' or phone like '%' || #{id} || '%' or brnumber like '%' || #{id} || '%' or access_key like '%' || #{id} || '%') and STATE = 1 order by cid desc)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / 15.0) FROM (SELECT cid, email, cname, name, phone, brnumber, access_key, state FROM OFFICIAL WHERE (cid LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%' OR email LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%' OR cname LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%' OR name LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%' OR phone LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%' OR brnumber LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%' OR access_key LIKE '%' || #{id} || '%') AND STATE = 1)
